website_summaries.verdict: The Char-Broil SmartChef Tru-Infrared cooks food well and has connected tech included, but it's expensive and its smarts aren't that useful.
pros: Char-Broil’s grill makes food that's consistently tasty and juicy
It comes with temperature probes and works with a mobile app to tell you when food is ready
cons: It makes a lot of smoke when it cooks
It's harder to clean than other outdoor grills
Its mobile app loses track of temperature reading when closed

customer_reviews.title: There appear to be different qualities of Tru-Infared elements..
customer_reviews.text: Some Char-Broil grill models have a Tru-Infared element that is a single sheet that is a separate piece below the grilling surface.. My 3-burner grill has Tru-Infared elements that are part of the grilling surface.. Performance may be the same for both styles, but cleaning is considerably more difficult when the Tru-Infared element is attached to grilling surface..
customer_reviews.author: FordPrefect

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping!
customer_reviews.text: Worst grill ever! The infrared grates make the food taste like its cooked indoors. Cleaning and seasoning the grill every time it’s used is required because the small holes in the grate gets clogged. HATE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grill
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill on a Monday for a weekend event and received it on Wednesday. Assembly took roughly 30 minutes with no issues what so ever. The grill looks great and cooks fantastic. This is my first infrared grill and I am very impressed so far. Temperature gets much hotter than any grill I have ever had before and I don't have to worry about burning the food because there is no way for the flames to get to what I am cooking. Clean up is easy if you follow the instructions and burn off excess food after grilling. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Arkie45

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this grill
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed!!! It was easy to assemble and looks great. The issue is it does not heat up past 375 degrees. The grates do not drip the grease, due to the small openings. In order to cook the food properly, I have to start meat on one side of the grill and move it to the other. Cleaning it is frustrating. Spend the extra and get a better grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy22

customer_reviews.title: Cooks steaks medium rare perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had a tru infrared grill from back in around 2009 when they first came out. I absolutely loved the grill I just hated cleaning it. The old cooking grates were 2 pieces and they were an absolute nightmare to clean. Fast forward to this grill and it cooks faster than my old one and with the new 1 piece cooking grate design and the cleaning tool that goes with it, cleaning is a snap!! Greatest grill I’ve ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Best grill
customer_reviews.text: We do 98% of our cooking on this grill outside our motor home when we travel. We had the exact same grill before we bought this for 3 years without one single problem. We even cooked our thanksgiving turkey in it one year and let me tell you it was the best turkey we have had. If you are looking for a grill that is well made and cooks meals evenly this is the grill you need. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JA7418

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning this is ridiculous. The tool provided really does nothing and burning off the grease just a build up that can't go anywhere because of the grates. I now avoid grilling because it's not worth the time it takes to clean afterwards. Another problem is that even on the lowest setting, it gets too hot. My food gets too burned before being cooked enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: NIGHTMARE TO ASSEMBLE !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute NIGHTMARE to assemble!!!!! Especially with cheap junk parts. See pictures of threaded brass dowel hole that is all tore up. And yes, it came that way. It is crazy that this passed the companies quality control....assuming they have quality control. Such a disappointment. My husband said if he wasn't as far along in the assembly process, he would throw it back in the box and send it back. Just so you know, my husband can do and put together anything! He is one of those guys everyone calls to fix things. This is just a very poor product design/quality.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Spouse, Happy House!
customer_reviews.text: Nailed it with this gift for Father’s Day! I love to assemble, so it was a gift for myself too. There was only one point during the set up that I did have to YouTube how this specific small wire hook attaches. For one who enjoys a little challenge and one project to focus on, I liked it. It did require my thought, attention, organization. It wasn’t too tough, but it also isn’t for a novice to set up. The directions weren’t super intuitive or detailed, but nor were they bad. Husband and family living it! It gets CRAZY hot CRAZY fast! I think it is lovely and perfect. Here’s to grillin’!
customer_reviews.author: Ralene Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great quality grill.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy, but the whole burner assembly and lid are one unit, and heavy. The instructs recommend two people(in small print) for assembly, but can be done by one strong person. There is no clear description of how to attach the little spring clip for the extra side burner. Loved that the screws were grouped for each assembly step, but the label for this is on the backside of the cardboard sheet that holds the parts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Somervill

customer_reviews.title: A change but I like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: No flare ups as advertised. Pretty easy assembly. Although on my front pieces, one had four dents in it still in the box prior to assembly. No big deal. I need to add a few hooks for utensils. I also need to figure out the best way to clean. And ... now to use a cooking spray or oil to prevent sticking. This was different from my previous grills but I like it. I do think it takes some adjustment from grates to this cook top though.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Big Grill For A 3 Burner
customer_reviews.text: i wanted a charbroil infrared grill for black friday and they only had this 3 burner. i've always had 4 burners but I'm happy with the size of this and don't think i will be sacrificing much. it put together very easy even though the instructions aren't always the most clear. the pictures are small and grainy but you can get it done. i'm very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Osburn

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Need help
customer_reviews.text: This must have taken a hard hit in shipping. The actual box not badly damaged. Not to styrofoam. No alarm bells. When put together the grates don’t line up. You see by the square that it is bowed. Inner corners where the tabs are not straight. We haven’t used. Just need help in what the proper steps are. Do we have to box up and send back? Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: mickie08

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Infrared cooks evenly, replaced other infrared that lasted over 10 years. Great grill at a great price. Gave as xmas gift for family that grills year round.
customer_reviews.author: smifam

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: So even cooking , 2 hour assembly, I should have heeded a previous review regarding the handle screws, tough to line up. Lost one screw down the shroud. Picked up replacement screw at hardware Store. Taped screw to screwdriver. All good. Highly recommend this grill. Clean grates often, no biggie
customer_reviews.author: Al B. Mcvicker

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Love our new grill works Great and we got early Monday morning had enough time to set up a grill that afternoon for Memorial Day !! Great service Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Infra-red Is Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this grill a dozen times, and I'm ready to get rid of it. No problem with the quality of the grill, just don't like the infra-red way of cooking. Give me a direct flame, and I'm happy. Had a Weber for 20 years and it worked fine. Time to eat my mistake and go back to what works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mezzano

customer_reviews.title: Bargin buy at this price
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. It’s not a tank built to last a lifetime. But I feel like if you keep it protect it will last for a long time. The grates are heavy and well made. The big thing you don’t get is any storage cabinet. Probably could built something to put under it if you wanted. Priced right for what you get. It cooks well, need to understand that even on low it gets hot. Does a great job of protecting the food from flare ups. Will use less propane because of the cooking design. I like it. Old grill was 4 burners, really never needed the fourth. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Todd bennett

customer_reviews.title: Solid backyard grill
customer_reviews.text: Do this thing Is awesome. Works phenomenal in 20 degree weather and gets maxed out in heat. The valve does have a safety feature that’ll cut down the pressure of you abruptly lose pressure, but, it’s easy to reset.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the poor directions. But once my buddy and figured out what the directions were trying to explain it work well. Operationally, I love it lights with no problem, the flames are even and consistent making for even cooking. Easily moved around since I sometime cook on the carport side of my house which is off of the kitchen and sometimes on the patio side off of the family room. I would put a vent on the cover so I could close the lid and still allow some smoke to escape.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special;  difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Concept sounded good, but all this is is a standard grill with a different cooking surface. The "grills" clog easily and are difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: E. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: All grill seem to have a limited lifetime. I do like the charbroil inferred , its the second one I've owned. The first one had 2 burners, it didn't work good when it was cold. The 3 burner model works a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: That it is wheelbase & I got it at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the wheeling part on this grill! Can take in back of house or out at end of carport! As for putting together my son did! He does this a lot! Took a little longer then it says! I would had someone put it together if he didn't!
customer_reviews.author: Munchie7

customer_reviews.title: Infrared
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grill and they were very good when it was missing an assembly part. I love the way it cooks without scorching Or flaring up.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: The warranty is not long enough
customer_reviews.text: For $140 more I could have gotten a lot better grill from Lowes. The one at Lowe’s was also a Tru-infrared type but it had stainless steel Reflector plate and Porcelain-coated, cast-iron grates. The cabinet was totally enclosed with two front stainless steel doors.This is a move superior Grill then what this one is 😞
customer_reviews.author: John A. Massoud

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. I’ve had many grills in my 52 years and this one is by far the best. The infrared cooking is the only way to go. I’ll never go back to a regular burner grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't produce infrared!
customer_reviews.text: It claims to be true infrared, but nothing heats up to the degree that it glows in the infrared. Take it from a physicist. So it does not sear meat. It use of TRU INFRARED must have been dreamed up by the marketing department. In any case it is misleading. My steaks ended up medium instead of rare.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Mullaney

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say easy to assemble as it was tricky trying to get some screws in. Also the instructions don’t really tell you what to do, they show pictures and you have to figure it out. Took me 3 hours total and I had 3 screws left but it’s working well
customer_reviews.author: Lee McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning sucks
customer_reviews.text: Had this grill for about a month and a half. Pros: cooks fine and the infrared grates does seem to reduce flair ups so that’s a plus. Cons: this grill SUCKS to clean. The cleaning tool that comes with the grill just pushes stuff around and the holes in the grates are too small to get stuff through. Basically have to take off the grates before cooking to clean which is a pain in the ass. Overall - would not purchase this grill again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grill with side burner.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions where easy to follow. Wasn't much to it. Fee hex and phillips screws and I was grilling. Really wanted a side burner grill but not 500$+
customer_reviews.author: Timeless161

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a joke, save your money. The grill itself has no slats. You need to pressure wash off the excess as a brush doesn’t work. I also paid for Amazo to assemble the grill and the handles have already broken off the grill with 3 months of use. Save your money. This grill is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It cooks well, no hotspots. But the grates are really hard to clean and keep clean. It came with a scraping tool but that doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: it's a good grill
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is very easy to clean, and to keep it clean, you need to take it apart and clean separately. but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON M DISPIRITO

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a rental
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a rental house. I've never used it, but we haven't had any complaints. Because we've never used it I couldn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a great size for the starter family. Easy assembly and easy cleaning. Get a grill cover to keep the steel nice and shiny, but I foresee this one lasting a solid amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, bad grates
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to assemble, easily gets to 500degrees, well put together. The downside is the grates. They require thorough cleaning after each use because food/grease gets clogged in them. Almost every time I fire it up it’s a huge smoke pit while that burns off. I bought some replacement grates that look normal and the problem alias completely gone away. Now I just have. A great grill.
customer_reviews.author: epinephrine

customer_reviews.title: Great but challenging to assemble
customer_reviews.text: “Some assembly required”!!! Took my husband & I 3 hours to assemble but my husband enjoys his Father’s Day gift very much!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Quick pre-heating, even grilling. Very responsive controls. Happy with the purchase all around.
customer_reviews.author: agalwholuvsdogs

customer_reviews.title: Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easier for two at end to set unit on legs. But, I managed by myself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It heats up fast and cooks quickly. It is very efficient. I love it. On the down side, you need to maintain it. You have to clean it every time you grill. Still, I find it is worth it. It doesn’t take that long and you get great results.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Scott

customer_reviews.title: A good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Present for my Son. He said it was the best present I ever could have gotten him and the infrared feature keeps the grease flare ups down to a bare minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts but went together good. Bought for sons first grill.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I have ever owned. Fantastic char marks and you can taste the meat and not the heat.
customer_reviews.author: jonmichi

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill. It was easy to put together as long as you follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Infrared BBQ
customer_reviews.text: The Infrared cooking makes a Big difference in the quality of taste
customer_reviews.author: DUTCHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Solid product works great. Jad problem on assembly 1 thing the spring for side was hard to see how it went in place but got it. Very easy assembly other then that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Father’s Day and he absolutely loves it! Very nice grill.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Mason

customer_reviews.text: Came with a rather large dent unfortunately. It’s like opening a present as a kid on Xmas day and find your toy broken. 🤷🏼‍♂️ I do like the bbq ers though this is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Doug madsen

customer_reviews.title: Char grill’s customer service —very lacking
customer_reviews.text: The grill came with out the starter button. I contacted Char Grill I could never get the button. They ignored me, closed my case and were no help at all!!! I responded to every question they had. I would have paid for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: My second Char Broil infrared. This one not as nice as my first. I've been super happy with my first. had high hopes for this one. Horrible BBQ. Holy flare up!! Don't buy!! Doesn't have cast iron grates
customer_reviews.author: C.U.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE IGNITERS for main burners
customer_reviews.text: This grill DOES NOT have igniters for main burners, just side burner only. Must light burners with match or grill lighter, would have not bought if I had known!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow w. Smith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product as compared to the price. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Suvash

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Grill was great unfortunately the top has a huge dent in the back I assume from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Angel B. Voss

customer_reviews.title: It had a dent!
customer_reviews.text: It had a dent in it but it works great! I just didn’t like that it had a dent
customer_reviews.author: Betty Finkbiner

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: Grill was fine and easy to set up. Very disappointed that grill was all dented in the back and I didn’t see that until almost completely done. Now I’m stuck with a grill that has big dents in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel J. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my stainless steel charbroil grill good price for this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma

customer_reviews.title: Grill
customer_reviews.text: Good grill. Even high heat for searing meat. Worth the moneu
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than perfect BBQ for the price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best barbecue I've owned. Cooks everything so easily and well I would buy it again if I needed to. Cleaning is a bit of a chore but a lot of it will burn off if you raise the temperature high enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Review - It never worked
customer_reviews.text: Ignitor switch broken and gas line valve leaked, spent all day putting it together and went to cook dinner and nothing! After spending all that time putting it together we were told we needed to take it apart to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Everything lined up. Took my time and it took two hours to assemble
customer_reviews.author: David tripp

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Everything is fine, except when you go to clean it. It's a little tough getting to all the "grooves" that need to be cleaned. Other than that, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Otten

customer_reviews.title: Great  value
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! Cooks very evenly and heats up quickly. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grill
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good price it with last for many, many years
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got for my boyfriend for his birthday. He loves it. Nice looking and cooks steak to perfection. Haven't used the side burner yet. ...
customer_reviews.author: ADAM J. SHABER

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this grill! Was pretty easy to assemble and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Easy to put together. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. If you can afford a Webber. Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: William Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cookouts. Heats evenly and easily gets to 650°
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gas grill I’ve ever bought !
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous works just the way they said it would. No flare ups.
customer_reviews.author: William J McKee

customer_reviews.title: U will love cooking on this grill
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged.good directions. But the shelf attachment screws are incorrectly labeled.the 8 screws with a larger head hold the shelves.other then that easy breezy.i use a small makita impact driver.but be sure to use the proper size bit or screwdriver.put some steaks on this grill and they were the best i have cooked.love tru infrared.no flareup.500 degrees in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: David s.

customer_reviews.title: Infrared cooking at its best
customer_reviews.text: We love this BBQ. Everything we've cooked on it has turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Candler

customer_reviews.title: Problems with Grill and no help from Char-Broil Customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have spent over two hours trying to contact the Char-Broil customer service and the only response we have received is that our case has been closed because we did not respond back to them. I have called 4 times and left messages and have "register" my grill multiple time. The problems is the QCCV value on my unit is defective and the grill will not get hot enough. I have reset the value multiple times and changed tanks, but we can't get enough flame to fully heat up the grill. Worst customer service ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Thunder

product_meta.title: Char-Broil 463370719 Performance TRU-Infrared 3-Burner Cart Style Gas Grill, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: An Exclusive, the Char-Broil Performance Series TRU-Infrared 3-Burner Stainless Steel Gas Grill has the features you need for a mid-size, stress-free cookout. Sufficiently sized for the family or parties, this unit features 450-square-inches of primary cooking space coupled with Char-Broil TRU-Infrared technology, which prevents flare-ups, delivers even-heat and cooks juicier food. Also features a 150 square inch swing-away warming rack for indirect cooking. Effortlessly cook for friends and family with ease and confidence. Porcelain-coated grates are durable, rust-resistant and easy-to-clean, while the electronic ignition offers reliable push-to-start operation. 24, 000-BTU's across the three main burners and also features a 10, 000-BTU side burner, ideal for sauces and sides. Lid-mounted temperature gauge so you can easily monitor the inside temperature of your grill and two wheels for increased mobility. Assembly required, measures 54. 1-inches W x 23. 4-inches D x 45. 5-inches H, and weighs about 98 lbs.
feature_bullets: Exclusive stainless steel finish for increased style and durability
TRU-Infrared cooking technology prevents flare-ups, delivers even-heat and cooks juicier food
450-square-inches of primary cooking space is great for most cookouts
Porcelain-coated grates are durable, rust-resistant and easy-to-clean
Reliable push-to-start electronic ignition and swing-a-way warming rack for added versatility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars355 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
